mapper.insert: INSERT INTO R_STUDENT(NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, BIRTH_TIME, ENROLLMENT_TIME, MAJOR, PHOTO, REMARK, READONLY) VALUES (#{name},#{sex},#{birthday},#{birthTime},#{enrollmentTime},#{major},#{photo},#{remark},#{readonly})

INSERT INTO R_STUDENT(NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, BIRTH_TIME, ENROLLMENT_TIME, MAJOR, PHOTO, REMARK, READONLY) VALUES
(#{item.name},#{item.sex},#{item.birthday},#{item.birthTime},#{item.enrollmentTime},#{item.major},#{item.photo},#{item.remark},#{item.readonly})
